name: Carlos Dutti: Unexpected War
description:
Carlos Dutti: Unexpected War

In a World devastated by desolation and countless wars, a man decides to change the fate of the world. He will fight in unexpected battles to win the unexpected war for the sake of the world! The name of that man was Carlos Dutti. He will fight against unexpected warriors from all ages for the future of humanity.

A game developed in 9 days (counting hitting my head with the wall and crying for ideas), designed after watching ME!ME!ME! and When your Dream makes no sense ten times straight and writing all the nonsense great ideas and concepts into a text document and then making it into a playable game.
